abstract.text: Query measurement values including colorimetry, spectral reflectance, and density

inlineContent.text: Measurements from Nix devices are provided as objects conforming to the
protocol. These contain all data and metadata to completely describe the measurement. Color, spectral, and density data are obtained from the
, respectively. The differences between these object types are listed below.
